crons.zrt_shipping module¶

ZRT Shipping

Parses emails from UPS for ZRT shipping and adds them to the DB

crons.zrt_shipping.UPS(conf)¶

Fetch and parse the UPS emails

Parameters

conf (dict) – The config data

Returns

list

crons.zrt_shipping.USPS(conf)¶

Fetch and parse the UPS emails

Parameters

conf (dict) – The config data

Returns

list

crons.zrt_shipping.ZRT_KIT_DELIVERED = 28¶

HRT/SMS ids

crons.zrt_shipping.reUPS = re.compile('Tracking Number:\\s+([A-Z0-9]+)\\s+(https?:\\/\\/.*?datesent=([0-9]{8}).*)\\s+Ship To:\\s+([^\\n]+)\\s+([^\\n]+)\\s+([^,]+),\\s+([A-Z]{2})\\s+([0-9]{5}(?:-[0-9]{4})?)\\s+US', re.MULTILINE)¶

UPS RegEx

crons.zrt_shipping.reUSPS = re.compile("A package was shipped to you on ([0-9]{2}\\/[0-9]{2}\\/[0-9]{4}) via U\\.S\\. Postal Service Priority Mail, Small Flat Rate Box to the following address:\\s+([^\\n]+)\\s+([^\\n]+)\\s+(.+?)\\s+([A-Z]{, re.MULTILINE)¶

USPS RegEx

Run

Entry point into the script

  • arg1 (str) – Possible data passed to the report
